basics.name: Abdul Mukit
basics.label: Computer Vision Engineer
basics.summary: Computer Vision Engineer with 3+ years of experience in deep learning and classical computer vision based software development.

work.name: Mujin-US

highlights: OpenCV, PyTorch, Object Detection, Instance Segmentation, 6-DoF Pose Estimation.

work.name: University of Oklahoma

highlights: OpenCV, PyTorch, Object Detection, 6-DoF Pose Estimation, Mixed Reality, Hololens-2.

awards.title: Wethington Graduate Fellowship
awards.summary: This 5-year fellowship is used to recruit outstanding graduate students. $25,000 stipend supplement is awarded over a 5 year period along with a Graduate Research Assistantship.

awards.title: Undergraduate Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: The top 1% of the students are awarded full tuition and fee waivers. This scholarship is awarded based on a candidate's GPA of the previous semester.
